pages.title: Orbital Scan #0084
pages.text: $(bold)Subject: Concentrated Acheronite Storage$()$(br2)9 Refined Acheronite ingots compressed into a single block. It radiates a $(bold)+10°C warmth aura$() in a 3-block radius. Yes, the coldest material on Earth somehow keeps things warm when you put enough of it together.$(br2)$(italic)"That doesn't make any sense."$(br)"Neither does the sun abandoning you, and yet here we are." — ORSA Orbital$(br2)Use it as compact storage or as a supplementary heat source. It won't replace a Thermal Heater, but it'll keep your toes from falling off. Orbital scans confirm your toes are still attached. For now.

pages.title: Acheronite Block
pages.text: 9 ingots in a grid. Congratulations, you've made a very expensive, very cold brick that somehow radiates warmth. ORSA physics at its finest.

pages.title: Back to Ingots
pages.text: Changed your mind? Place the block in a crafting grid to get your 9 ingots back. No refunds on the existential dread.
